entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C

Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
